nodes.title: Update readme with latest release version number
Set arity for boolean options to 1 to match environment key value pairs
Comply default stream application name schema with kube dns
Remove default custom environment variables ingestion from values.yaml
Add workaround for rclone config permissions
Update openbridge/ob_bulkstash version and allow arguments
Restart failed cleanup jobs instead of creating new pods
Clean schemas of pseudo topics created when performing a foreign key join
Fix nil warnings about empty yaml lists in value files
Reset schema of internal topics when they are deleted
Add node affinity to helm chart
Add priority class to helm charts
Add consumer group annotation from autoscaling
Do not delete consumer group if it does not exist
Delete consumer groups on delete output
Add scaled object for autoscaling with keda
Add extra input topics to streams app
Add labels, annotations and configurable name to rclone CronJob
Update Kafka to 2.5.1 and Confluent to 5.5.1
Specify additional output topics via default CLI
Add annotations to clean up job
Remove container suffix from container name
Close resources on streams creation error
Only run streams resetter for existing topics
Merge streams chart for statefulset and deployment
Use Kubernetes secrets for password parameters
Revert PicoCli api usage to exit application properly
Run streams resetter for external source topics and intermediate topics
Add helm chart to deploy streams app as statefulset with static group membership
Allow specification of boolean flags without any value
Parse streams config from separate environment variables
Check for errors when running streams resetter
Add hook for Streams state transitions
Fix parsing of environment parameters with ENV_PREFIX in name
Call close after application clean up
Prioritize Kafka Streams Config passed via CLI over overridden properties
Allow custom labels for jobs and deployments
Classify all Kafka errors as recoverable bar some exceptions
Add flat value transformers for error handling
Add a helm chart for running Streams App as a job
Expose delete topic method to subclasses
Add utility method for single input topic
Allow multiple input topics and add an error topic
Add hook for registering an uncaught exception handler
Allow kafka streams configuration with external parameter
Release new version of kafka-streams chart
Add cleanup possibility on processor startup
Add CLI parameter to allow reprocessing of data
Change log level on debug for child app in different package
Add support for AWS roles and pod resources
